news.title: Elon Musk says xAI has acquired X in deal that values social media site at $33 billion
news.summary: Elon Musk says his startup xAI has acquired his social media company X. In a social media post on Friday, Musk said xAI had acquired X.

news.title: JD Vance accuses Denmark of failing to keep Greenland secure as he slams European allies
news.summary: Vance's visit comes as President Donald Trump hardens his rhetoric about taking control of Greenland. Trump has said he wants to take control of the island nation.

news.title: Why tariffs could push car prices even higher
news.summary: Tariffs will likely push car prices past the record highs seen in recent years. Tariffs are expected to be the biggest factor in the rise in car prices.

news.title: Trump commutes sentence of Ozy Media founder Carlos Watson just before prison surrender
news.summary: Ozy falsely claimed to have deals with Google and Oprah Winfrey. Company and CEO Watson were criminally charged. Ozy is now being run by ex-Navy SEALs.

news.title: Why it's so hard to fix the U.S. air traffic control problems
news.summary: The U.S. has a severe shortage of air traffic controllers. There are currently 10,800 certified controllers but the country needs to have more than 14,000.
